wikipedia_page.main: Heledd Fychan (born 20 September 1980) is a Welsh politician and a former director of Policy and Political Education for Plaid Cymru. She was elected to the Senedd for the South Wales Central region in May 2021.

response: *Heledd Fychan, MS for South Wales Central

In the Senedd, Llandaff is part of the constituency of Cardiff West, whose current MS since 2011 is Mark Drakeford of Labour; he succeeded Rhodri Morgan upon the latter's retirement.  The constituency is within the electoral region of South Wales Central, whose four current MSs are Conservatives Andrew R. T. Davies and Joel James; Plaid Cymru's Rhys ab Owen and Heledd Fychan.
